version_description:
Support for iOS 6
Support for screen resolution of iPhone 5

- Support for scrolling in active applications right on iPad / iPhone / iPod touch
- Virtual display can operate in two modes: Normal and Extended
- Updated touchscreen controlling gestures
- Bug fixes

- Sound transmission (for now works with Windows, will be available for Mac OS very soon)
- Bug fixes

Like iDisplay? Please take the time to leave User Review whenever you update!

- Now El Capitan, iOS9, Retina supported
- User interface improvements
- Bugfixes

Like iDisplay? Please take the time to leave User Review whenever you update!

Windows 10 is supported now! This update makes iDisplay much better and faster. A couple of bugs is fixed as well.
If you're enjoying iDisplay, we would really appreciate a review. We read every comment, and will consider your suggestions for future updates.

iDisplay supports now Lightning and 30-pin cable connection on OS X!
You can now switch anytime between USB and Wifi connection, enjoying much more flexibility!
We made several other improvements as well!
Thank you for using iDisplay!

- Almost 0 latency with hardware support of the cursor, when connected through USB!
- 60fps supported! (was 30fps)
- Macs 2011 and up will have a significant performance boost
- Heating strongly reduced!
- Significantly improved performance on iPad Air and iPad 2, 3, 4

Also:
-Optimized performance in Shared Main Display mode, so now the amount of connected devices is limited to the network’s strength, rather than Mac’s computing resources
-Many bug fixes

Notes:
-Kept the option to work with the previous Mac desktop versions, but we HIGHLY recommend updating it at getidisplay.com/downloads/iDisplay_2_7_0.dmg
-Support for multiple connected iOS devices in Additional Display Mode and macOS Sierra optimizations will come in the next version

If iDisplay makes you more productive, we would appreciate an App Store review. Thank you!

- Almost 0 latency with hardware support of the cursor, when connected through USB!
- 60fps supported! (was 30fps)
- Macs 2011 and up will have a significant performance boost
- Heating strongly reduced!
- Significantly improved performance on iPad Air and iPad 2, 3, 4

Also:
-Optimized performance in Shared Main Display mode, so now the amount of connected devices is limited to the network’s strength, rather than Mac’s computing resources.
Works very well for EDUCATION / colleges!

-Many bug fixes

Notes:
-Kept the option to work with the previous Mac desktop versions, but we HIGHLY RECOMMEND updating it at www.getidisplay.com
-Support for multiple connected iOS devices in Additional Display Mode and macOS Sierra optimizations will come in the next version

If iDisplay makes you more productive, we would appreciate an App Store review.
Thank you!

Brand new UI!
Many improvements and bug fixes

Thank you for using iDisplay!
To make it better for you we have included many bug fixes and improvements in this update.

Strongly recommended to download the latest iDisplay Desktop for macOS or Windows from getidisplay.com.
+ Completely revamped UI
+ User Onboarding
+ Intelligent autoconnection
+ QR-Code connectivity
+ Simplified rotation process
+ Troubleshooting
+ Comprehensive bug fixes and stability improvements

If you’re enjoying iDisplay, we would really appreciate a review. We read every comment, and will consider your suggestions for future updates!

Thank you for using iDisplay. We regularly update iDisplay to ensure you have a great experience using our app.
To make it better for you, we have included some bug fixes and performance improvements in this update.

Download the latest iDisplay Desktop for macOS or Windows from getidisplay.com.

Enjoying iDisplay? We would really appreciate a review. We read every comment and will consider your suggestions for future updates.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

MacOS High Sierra supported! Download the latest iDisplay Desktop for macOS or Windows from getidisplay.com
